hero.title: CONNECTING WITH
hero.description1: At ASIA PACIFIC GROUP we transform logistics into a competitive advantage. We are specialists in foreign trade, customs, and international legislation, offering intelligent and customized solutions for every link in the supply chain.
hero.description2: More than a logistics partner, we are your strategic ally to connect your company with the world, ensuring that every movement of your goods translates into growth, trust, and global success.

benefits.title: Why Choose Us?
benefits.description: We stand out for our professionalism, discipline, and absolute commitment to excellence, combining technical knowledge, innovation, and legal strategy so that every operation flows smoothly.
benefits.experienceText: Over 10 years of experience, trained staff, honest and with proven integrity.
benefits.integrationText: Technology in all our processes, continuous equipment updates to stay at the forefront.
benefits.presenceText: In Mexico and its main ports, customs, and industrial cities in Asia, mainland China, United States, Canada, Italy, France, European Union, Brazil, and Colombia.
benefits.solutionsText: Tailored for each client, business plan according to their specific needs.
benefits.securityText: Guarantee of customs, administrative, and fiscal security in your operations.
benefits.innovationText: Constant innovation as an important extension of the client in their production processes.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Comprehensive foreign trade solutions tailored to your company's needs
about.missionText: To be leaders in our field by providing fast, effective, reliable, and timely service, offering innovative, secure, and integrated logistics solutions to our clients; constantly training our employees and creating an environment of stability and job satisfaction.
about.visionText: To distinguish ourselves by being a serious, responsible company with the best service and at the forefront, resulting in quality in everything we do. To be a strategic ally in comprehensive solutions that support and boost our clients' services.
about.valuesText: Integrity, responsibility, honesty, commitment, service, proactivity, innovation, cooperation, self-criticism.

services.title: Our
services.subtitle: Comprehensive foreign trade solutions tailored to your company's needs

customsClearance.title: Customs Clearance
customsClearance.description: We handle the entire process and formalities that your goods need to comply with customs authorities for importing or exporting.

transport.title: LTL & FTL Transport
transport.description: We know how important your cargo is to you, which is why at APG we take care of every detail of your shipment, ensuring it arrives in perfect condition and on time.

packageRelease.title: Retained Package Release
packageRelease.description: We understand the difficulties when importing from anywhere in the world, so APG provides you with effective options to release your retained packages.

importExpress.title: Import Express Duty Free
importExpress.description: Eliminate risks in your investments; let our experience handle customs procedures and transportation for your e-commerce business.

importZero.title: Import Zero by CBM
importZero.description: Send your goods to our warehouses in Guangzhou or Dongguan and we'll handle the entire process until delivery to our distribution centers.

weBuy.title: We - Buy
weBuy.description: We handle the purchase and logistics management of your products in Asia, ensuring quality, price, and optimal delivery times.

trading.title: Trading Company
trading.description: Import service for legal entities and individuals from anywhere in the world, without needing to be registered as importers.

customsProcedures.title: Customs Procedures
customsProcedures.description: We conduct a thorough analysis of your company's needs to provide personalized support and comply with applicable regulations.

cargoInsurance.title: Cargo Insurance
cargoInsurance.description: We offer solutions that guarantee your cargo arrives safely at its destination, with technology and risk prevention measures.

expressParcel.title: Express Parcel
expressParcel.description: National and international parcel and courier services with competitive rates and real-time tracking system.

audits.title: Origin Audits and Pre-checks
audits.description: We verify that your suppliers meet quality standards, ensuring your products are correct and ready for import.

clients.title: Our
clients.subtitle: Companies that trust our logistics solutions

contact.title: Ready to Simplify Your Operations?
contact.description: Contact us today and discover how we can optimize your customs processes with efficiency and professionalism

footer.description: Your reliable partner in foreign trade and customs management.
